    • Method Detail

      • getStoreNumber

        public int getStoreNumber()
        Gets the store's identification number.
        Returns:
        Store number

      • getCurrentSales

        public double getCurrentSales()
        Gets the current store sales from the Manager.
        Returns:
        current store sales

      • addEmployee

        public void addEmployee(StoreEmployee employee)
        Adds a new employee to the store's staff.
        Parameters:
        employee - The Employee being added to the staff.

      • setManager

        public void setManager(Manager manager)
        Names the Manager for the store. A store can have only one manager, so when a manager is set using this method, any existing manager will be replaced.
        Parameters:
        manager - The manager of the store.

      • getEmployees

        public java.util.List<Employee> getEmployees()
        Gets a list of all current store employees, of all types.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of all employees.

      • printEmployees

        public void printEmployees()
        Prints a list of all current store employees and their role.

      • processPayroll

        public PayrollRecord[] processPayroll()
        Calculates current payroll and creates a payroll record for each of the store employees.
        Returns:
        An array of payroll records.

      • printPayroll

        public void printPayroll()
        Prints out a copy of the store's current payroll records.

      • getPayroll

        public PayrollRecord[] getPayroll()
        Returns any existing payroll records. This method does not process payroll, so the records it returns may not be current. If no payroll records exist, it will write a message to System.err and return null.
        Returns:
        An array of payroll records.
